body.name: POWEART Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Powerful Suction Vacuum Cleaner with LED Floor Brush, 6-in-1 Multifunction Ultra Lightweight Quiet Rechargeable Vacuum Cleaner for Home Pet Hair
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 8 mins
features: 【Powerful Suction & Efficient Cleaning】 Equipped with a high-performance upgraded motor, the POWEART cordless stick vacuum delivers an impressive suction power of 15,000PA. Tackle all types of dirt and debris on floors and carpets with ease.

【Effortless Operation & Extended Runtime】 With just a click, you can start the vacuum or switch between the two suction modes. The built-in 6-cell 2200mAh battery ensures an uninterrupted runtime of up to 45 minutes (measured at handheld mode with standard speed).

【Enhanced Cleaning Performance】 Featuring a widened LED floor brush with a powerful V-shaped beater roller, the stick vacuum cleaner effectively picks up dirt and debris in less time. The front LED lights illuminate hidden dirt, ensuring thorough cleaning. Experience exceptional maneuverability with the flexible brush head.

【Advanced Filtration System】 Our multi-stage filtration system captures up to 99.99% of fine particles, providing a cleaner and healthier home environment. The washable filters not only maintain cleaning performance but also extend the lifespan of the vacuum cleaner. An extra filter pad is included in the package.

【Versatile Handheld Cleaning Tools】 The stick vacuum can easily convert into a handheld vacuum for versatile cleaning. Additional tools, including a 2-in-1 cleaning brush, and a crevice tool, make it convenient to clean furniture and cars.

【Convenient Storage Options】 Attached is a wall mount for compact storage of the vacuum and its tools, or you can adjust the vacuum cleaner and store it in your closet or car trunk. Let's enjoy clutter-free convenience after each use.

【Worry-Free Warranty】POWEART provides a 12-month warranty and professional service for each cordless vacuum cleaner. If you have any questions or concerns about the product, please do not hesitate to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this vacuum as I just got hardwood floors and was tired of pushing around my heavier vacuum cleaner and having to plug it in and unplug it in each room. This vacuum is perfect answer to that problem. It was so easy to put together. I think it took me maybe five minutes. The suction is great. I love how the vacuum had swivels and gets in corners etc. it charges fast and I can do five rooms plus my two bathrooms all in one charge. I like the button for the extra suction for the corners and along the baseboards. It is lightweight enough for me And emptying it is pretty simple. If I have any issue with it at all, it would be that you actually can’t have a freestanding. You have to hang it, it comes with the wall mount and hardware. I have not installed that yet, but when you do you have to make sure it is near an outlet so you can charge it. I have not used the attachments yet, but they look nice and sturdy and they attach on the wall mount.
